decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The developments to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of 5 years, beginning with the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The facing materials to be used for the external surfaces of the building/extension hereby approved shall be those specified in the approved drawing no's 99151/111 A, 99151/108, 99151/110  & 99151 147 or planning application form unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 3 - A tree planting/landscaping scheme, which should include full details of species, size of plants and spacing shall be submitted to the Local Planning Authority for approval and be implemented during the next planting season after the completion of the building operations on site, or within any such longer period as may be agreed in writing with the Local Planning Authority. The Council will require a maintenance period of 3 years during which dead, dying or defective trees, shrubs and ground cover must be replaced.
description: ALTERATIONS AND EXTENSIONS TO THE BACK STRAIGHT ENCLOSURE ON THE WEST SIDE OF THE STADIUM, INCLUDING A NEW TURNSTILE BLOCK WITH LIFT SHAFT AND STAIRCASES. RESURFACING, FENCING AND LANDSCAPING OF THE MAINTENANCE YARD TO PROVIDE 42 CAR PARKING SPACES.
